Description:
Responsibilities:Making sure your department is neat, priced, and stocked to give customers a positive shopping experience.
Acting as an expert on a range of home furnishing finishing solutions, products, and services such as Kitchen, Doors, and Windows installations to inspire, inform, and help the customer make the correct purchase.
Achieving your monthly sales targets.
Seeks opportunities for self-development and career advancement.You will not only experience a fun-filled work environment, but will be rewarded with outstanding pay and benefits!Skills
Skills:
Your values reflect ABYAT's values.
2 years' experience in retail sales, must be in the home finishing sectors
Must have background experience in home finishing sector (Kitchens, Doors, and Windows).
Quickly learns new technology.
Good communicator.
Focuses on results and achieving personal work objectives. Shows an understanding of the importance of the customer.
Our benefits vary by position, but may include the following:

Health insurance
Life insurance
Two days off a week
Monthly bonus
Annual Flight Tickets
30 Days Paid Annual Vacation
Career Growth Opportunities
Paid Trainings

Preferred.Residence Location: Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates ; Medina, Saudi Arabia
